channel.title: [508] Objects Problem
channel.description:
Hey guys. I have added lots of objects in my [508], and they're randomly appearing in any random place... :eek:
I have seen the training area at least 6 times... But this was the final straw:
[IMG]http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo13/CarnagePK/Fuckup1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo13/CarnagePK/Fuckup2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo13/CarnagePK/Placewheretheyspawn.jpg[/img]
Method: [CODE] public void createGlobalObject(int objectId, int height, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int type); [/CODE]
I also tried this method:
[CODE] public void createObject(Player p, int objectId, int height, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int type); [/CODE]
Post any other info you might need.
If you tell me if it's fixable and, if it is, how to fix it, that would be a great help. Thanks.

item.title: [508] Objects Problem
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Hey guys. I have added lots of objects in my [508], and they’re randomly appearing in any random place… :eek:

I have seen the training area at least 6 times… But this was the final straw:

Method:

public void createGlobalObject(int objectId, int height, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int type);

I also tried this method:

public void createObject(Player p, int objectId, int height, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int type);

Post any other info you might need.

If you tell me if it’s fixable and, if it is, how to fix it, that would be a great help. Thanks.
